item.title: Spawning items plz help
item.dc:creator: @deershoot3r deershoot3r
item.description:
@deershoot3r wrote:

this is in the itemspawnpoints.java im using alstarscape v2 and i have added the items to it but they dont show up.
here is my code did i do something wrong?

// Item Spawn Points by xerozcheez
import java.io.*;

public class itemspawnpoints {
public int spawntimer = 0;

public void LoadItems() {
    for (int i = 0; i <= 5000; i++) {
        if (spawntimer <= 1) {
            ItemHandler.addItem(2414, 3118, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Zammy Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2412, 3119, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Sara Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(2413, 3120, 9848, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // Guthix Cape
            ItemHandler.addItem(1038, 3215, 3430, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 3215, 3429, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // blu phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1038, 3215, 3428, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 3214, 3427, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // blu phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1038, 3213, 3427, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 3212, 3427, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // blu phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1038, 3211, 3428, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 3211, 3429, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // blu phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1038, 3211, 3430, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 3212, 3431, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // blu phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1038, 3213, 3431, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // red phat
            ItemHandler.addItem(1042, 3214, 3431, 1,
                    ItemHandler.globalItemController[i], false); // blu phat
            spawntimer = 100;
        }
    }
}

public void process() {
    LoadItems();
    spawntimer -= 1;
}

}
